title: Has anyone written letters to their future self? What was it like? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes! I started doing it in… sixth grade, I believe??? I lost the one I wrote in sixth grade, actually…. So, when I opened it, I read through it and made another one for the next year explaining what was going on then, what I liked, etc. Around the end of 7th grade (May, June, July 2019), we were looking at a lot of houses, because my parents really wanted to move. Eventually, in early September, we did! And it’s really funny, because the letter I opened in November said something like, Oh, and are you living in Paola now? Because we’re looking at houses a lot… Something like that. It was my past self knew the future! So I have another letter in my drawer that says “Don’t open until November 2”, give or take a few days - I don’t remember the exact date. In approximately around four or five months, I’ll open it and make another one for 2021. It’s really fun to do, actually, to see how you’ve changed. For example, read your last year letter and you think, “Wow, I actually liked that movie then??!!” or “How could I have done that?!” I highly recommend trying it!
